A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm not big into the Star Wars universe but this wasn't just a horrible Star Wars movie\, this was an objectively bad film. Overall it was boring\, the acting was distractingly bad\, there were plot holes galore\, and they littered the film with cringe worthy attempts at humor. I loved Rogue One\, but this was a pile of garbage. So bad that I refuse to pay Disney money to see any future films in this franchise. \n\nCritics that reviewed this movie positively were likely either bribed\, scared that they would be blacklisted from screening future Disney films for an honest review\, or enjoy the occasional hit from the ol' crack pipe.
